titleStmt.title: Homer alamode, the second part, in English burlesque, or, A mock-poem upon the ninth book of Iliads

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by S. Roycroft for Dorman Newman ...,

notesStmt.note: The second part has special t.p. (p. [2] following p. 77): Deuteripideuteron : the second part of the second part of Homer alamode, or, A mock-poem on the ninth book of the Odysses.
Reproduction of original in the University of Illinois (Urbana-Champaign Campus). Library.
